description:
A flexible JSON/YAML linter for creating automated style guides, with baked in support for OpenAPI v3.1, v3.0, and v2.0 as well as AsyncAPI v2.x.


What's Changed
- chore(repo): fix ci pipeline by @mnaumanali94 in #2706
- fix(rulesets): always allow string examples in asyncapi schema by @timonback in #2625
- chore(deps): bump rollup from 2.79.0 to 2.79.2 by @dependabot in #2702
- chore(rulesets): add Arazzo to rulesets docs by @frankkilcommins in #2703
- feat(rulesets): add AsyncAPI v3 support by @jonaslagoni in #2697
- chore(deps): bump jsonpath-plus from 7.1.0 to 10.0.0 by @dependabot in #2709
- chore(deps): bump nimma 0.2.2 to 0.2.3 by @jacquesg in #2712
- chore(deps): update jsonpath-plus to fix CVE-2024-21534 by @johannesmarx in #2718
- chore(deps): bump elliptic from 6.5.7 to 6.6.0 by @dependabot in #2719
- chore(deps): update simple-eval usage by @mnaumanali94 in #2724
- fix(core): require new formats version by @mnaumanali94 in #2725
- feat(cli): require new stoplight dependencies by @mnaumanali94 in #2726
Full Changelog: https://github.com/stoplightio/spectral/compare/v6.13.1...v6.14.0
